title: kalai magaLE
sahitya:
kalaimagaLE ennai kAttaruLvAi kaTravar pOTriDum karpakamE nuN

(kalai)



anupallavi



nilavulagam tannil pala kalaiyum uNarnda pulavargaL

avaiyinir-talaimai peTrOngiDum 

(kalai)



caraNam



shirpiyin uLamagizh shirandiDum shelviyAm shevi koLum ishaiyinil

shIruDanE iruppAi

porppuran-kUttanil piDi naDaiyAyiruppAi puraiyilA Oviyanran

kaittiranAyiruppAi 

(kalai)
